scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish && rm -rf lib
scripts.demo dev baseDir: rm -rf ./demo/dist && npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env dev --baseDir ./b
scripts.demo dev: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env dev --useRem
scripts.demo-dev-local: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --config webpack.config.js --local --env dev --useRem --hash --cdn
scripts.demo dev-append: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env dev --useRem --append
scripts.demo dev nocdn: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js
scripts.demo dev name: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env dev --packageName q1
scripts.demo dev customEntry: rm -rf ./demo/dist npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --hash --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env dev --customEntry
scripts.demo uat1: rm -rf ./demo/dist npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env uat1
scripts.demo stg: rm -rf ./demo/dist npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env stg
scripts.demo prd: rm -rf ./demo/dist npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --config webpack.config.js --cdn --env prd
scripts.demo server: npm run build && cd demo && ../bin/cstool-build --server --config webpack.config.js --useRem --port 8000
